name: Waterstone Temple
description:
This was a game made for the summer 2018 "First game" Game jam. You play as an old man who gets trapped in a temple, and needs to collect water-stones scattered throughout in order to unlock a way to freedom though jumping across and avoiding spikes scattered everywhere.

Controls

  • Arrow Keys - move
  • Space - Jump

NOTE: I am aware that this game has some bugs, I was in a rush to get it out. I will try and fix them soon (maybe).
